alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 2:29PM PDT until March 22 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 4000 feet, with 8 to 16 inches across the higher elevations. 1 to 2 feet is possible for higher elevations south of Highway 50. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass and Highway 50 over Echo Summit. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult with delays and chain controls. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will be around 3000 to 5000 feet. The heaviest snow is expected today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
